    • displayAddToCartForm

      @RequestMapping(value="addToCart/{id}", method=GET) public java.lang.String displayAddToCartForm​(org.springframework.ui.Model model, @PathVariable java.lang.String id)
      This method displays the properties of the selected product that will be added to be ShoppingCart.
      Parameters:

    • processAddToCartForm

      @RequestMapping(value="addToCart/{id}", method=POST) public java.lang.String processAddToCartForm​(org.springframework.ui.Model model, @PathVariable java.lang.String id, @ModelAttribute("flower") @Valid @Valid ProductDto productDto, org.springframework.validation.Errors errors)
      This method adds the selected product to the ShoppingCart of the current user.
      Parameters:
      model -
      id - The id of the selected product.
      productDto - The productDto made with the properties of the selected product.
      errors -
      Returns:
      It redirects to the main page.
